item.description:
Join P-Collective Member Mike and Val from the Newcomers Meetup at Scürvey Dög!

A repeat of the highly attended gathering last month, Val and Mike have decided to do it again. The last Wednesday of every month features the New Vintage Alternative 80's & Classic Punk Party. So whether you want to dress in black, go vintage punk or just check it out, here's your chance! It was a lot of fun last time!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Mike U (Astronomer Mike) is hosting this one - please look at his picture!!!!
item.name: Scürvey Dög!
